---
title: "COVID-19 Actual Case Predictions"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggformula)
```

## Read Data

```{r Read Data}

confirmed <- read.csv("time_series_covid19_confirmed_US copy.csv")
deaths <- read.csv("time_series_covid19_deaths_US copy.csv")

confirmed
deaths

```

```{r US Deaths by Day}

colSums(deaths[,c(14:84)]) -> deathSub

as.data.frame(deathSub) -> deathSums

deathSums

```

```{r US Confirmed by Day}

colSums(confirmed[,c(13:83)]) -> confirmedSub

as.data.frame(confirmedSub) -> confirmedSums

confirmedSums

```

```{r Combined US}

bind_cols(deathSums, confirmedSums) -> combinedUS

combinedUS$rate <- combinedUS$deathSub / combinedUS$confirmedSub

combinedUS$Day1 <- (1 / combinedUS$rate) * combinedUS$deathSub

combinedUS$CurrentEstimate <- combinedUS$Day1*(1.2^13)

combinedUS$date <- seq(from = as.Date("2020-01-23"), to = as.Date("2020-04-02"), by = 'day')

combinedUS

```

```{r Graph US}

combinedUS %>% gf_line(CurrentEstimate ~ date, color = "ORANGE") %>% gf_line(confirmedSub ~ date, color = "RED")

```
